attributes.action: Show how many e-petitions have been successful
attributes.additional_details:
This site was created for people to have a say. Despite tens of millions of votes this site does not publish what has been successful but gladly shows what has been refused or closed.

Please show to people what e-petitions have been successful after debate to show that MP's are actually listening to people and taking action instead of ignoring and rubbishing valid ideas while worrying about the rent on their 2nd home.
